A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I couldn't help but be shocked by the many surprises that blindsided me\, leaving me unable to properly review this film on first viewing. After knowing what to expect the second time\, I can say the Last Jedi is possibly the most stunningly shot Star Wars film. There were some missed opportunities\, and some added unnecessaries. But the Porgs!!!! And I can't help but love Poe Dameron. Definitely had some pacing issues\, but hey\, it's Star Wars\, and it's wonderful.
